long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Clipping + Spaced Repetition: Capture web content directly to Anki for spaced repetition. Simply select text or images on any webpage and send them to Anki - either as-is or with your sidenotes. You can make multiple selections before sending them together, and easily return to the original context from your Anki cards. This extension serves as a powerful alternative to tools like Readwise, RemNote, Notion, Evernote, Onenote and other web clippers. To get started, click the extension icon in the top-right corner after installation to view the setup guide and usage instructions.

图文摘录 + 间隔复习：在网页上选中内容，发送到 Anki 进行复习，或者选中内容并添加批注后一起发送到 Anki 进行复习。支持文字和图片，支持多次选中不同内容，支持从 Anki 里跳转回到原来的上下文。可以用来替换 Readwise、RemNote、Notion、Evernote、Onenote 以及一些其他网页摘录扩展。安装后，请点击右上角的扩展图标，进入扩展的介绍页面了解首次配置的要求和使用方法。
